TABLE,root,root_id,ROOT

TABLE,demographics,root,EVENTS
FIELD,record_id,string
FIELD,first_name,string
FIELD,last_name,string
FIELD,address,string
FIELD,telephone,string
FIELD,email,string
FIELD,dob,date
FIELD,age,string
FIELD,ethnicity,varchar(255)
FIELD,race,varchar(255)
FIELD,sex,varchar(255)
FIELD,height,float
FIELD,weight,varchar(255)
FIELD,bmi,string
FIELD,comments,string
FIELD,age_variable,float
FIELD,fav_number_variable,float

TABLE,test_form_repeating_instruments,root,REPEATING_INSTRUMENTS
FIELD,number_fav_var,varchar(255)
